content.p: If you need a visa to study at the university, our dedicated visas and immigration team is here to help. Use our visa guidance webpages to plan and prepare your UK visa application, and understand your responsibilities. If you can't find the answers to your visa questions, or you need more guidance, contact our immigration advisers. We offer visa and immigration support for applicants, current students and their families and recent graduates. Our team provides free, professional support relating to student visa applications as well as advice on other visa and immigration issues. Email us for advice at immigration support. We will respond to the vast majority of emails within 3 â€“ 5 working days. It may take a little longer if your enquiry is particularly complex or if we need to consult with another department. Call 0115 846 6125, between 10am - 4pm UK time, Monday to Friday. Book an online video appointment with an Immigration Adviser. This service is only available to current University of Nottingham students, and students who have recently completed their studies who have an active IT account. Appointments are via Microsoft Teams call. There are dedicated webpages for international students, inclusing country-specific webpages, where you can find information specifically for students from your country: index Make an enquiry to ask any question about undergraduate or postgraduate courses at the University of Nottingham.
